item.title: Dollar Scholar Asks: What’s the Difference Between Cost and Price, and Does It Even Matter?
item.description: Cost and price are so intertwined that, in some cases, which word is correct to use is simply a matter of perspective.

item.title: How Big Will the COLA Be? Social Security on Track for Above-Average Raise in 2026
item.description: With one month to go until the announcement of the 2026 COLA, analysts predict Social Security benefits will rise by 2.7% — at minimum.

item.title: Aura Identity Theft Protection Review
item.description: We review Aura identity theft protection including pricing, plans, customer experience and accessibility.

item.title: Current Mortgage Rates: September 12, 2025
item.description: Freddie Mac's rate for a 30-year fixed-rate mortgage averaged 6.35% for the week ending September11, its lowest level so far this year.

item.title: Facebook Settlement Payments Are Finally Going Out to Millions of Users
item.description: The average payment will be $29.42, according to a Friday court filing from the plaintiffs.
